en.title: FE Congratulates Jamie Lim Gold Medal Winner Asia Pacific Karate Tournament, Singapore
en.content:
Samboy Lim with his 11 years old daughter, Jamie Lim, who recently participated in the Asia-Pacific Karate tournament held in Singapore and WON with 2 GOLD MEDALS.

She attribute her good performance to FusionExcel products which she has been using consistently since her father introduced it to her.

" With the increased strength,flexibility and balance , executing my Kata movement seem so much easier.The products not only help me physically but mentally too . I am able to stay focus and calm - "staying in the zone",during the Kumite. Am happy to have beaten the bigger and heavier opponents from orther countries.." - Jamie

" I don't know what makes me prouder !! The Ginebra Kings winning the PBA title or my daughter coming home from Singapore with two golds but sure is THANKFUL to FusionExcel products for giving us all that edge" - Samboy added.
